mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM( NUM, NAME, ROOM_TYPE, CNUM, IMGURL, SUMMARY, CONTENTS, PROPGUESTS, MAXGUESTS, WEEKDAYPRICE, WEEKENDPRICE, OPTIONS, AMENITY, REGDATE, REGID, STATUS ) VALUES( #{num}, #{name}, #{roomtype}, #{cnum}, #{imgurl}, #{summary}, #{contents}, #{propguests}, #{maxguests}, #{weekdayprice}, #{weekendprice}, #{options}, #{amenity}, SYSDATE, #{regid}, '01' )
mapper.select: SELECT NUM, NAME, ROOM_TYPE, IMGURL, SUMMARY, PROPGUESTS, MAXGUESTS, WEEKDAYPRICE, WEEKENDPRICE, OPTIONS, AMENITY FROM ROOM WHERE CNUM = #{cnum} AND STATUS = '01' ORDER BY NUM ASC
SELECT NUM, NAME, ROOM_TYPE, CNUM, PROPGUESTS, WEEKDAYPRICE, WEEKENDPRICE FROM ROOM WHERE NUM = #{rnum}
